basic.floral_language:
Bergeranthus multiceps 
Floriography: beautiful, delicate, tenacious
The plant is short, has many branches, fleshy leaves 3-4 cm long in a triangular pyramid shape, rigid and evergreen, easy to grow and take care, suitable for small combinations with other succulents in pots. 
Likes sunlight, but avoid scorching sunlight, does not have an apparent dormant period. Flowers sometimes, has scape emerging from the middle of leaves. Flowers are small in yellow or purple-red.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green , flower color yellow or purple red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, no apparent period of dormancy, avoid scorching light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when leaves become soft, reduce watering in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
